org.logl.logl

Class RotatingFilePrintWriterSupplier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.logl.logl.RotatingFilePrintWriterSupplier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.function.Supplier<java.io.PrintWriter>

    public final class RotatingFilePrintWriterSupplier
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.function.Supplier<java.io.PrintWriter>, java.io.Closeable
    A Supplier for a PrintWriter that writes to an sequence of output files, rotating to a new file whenever the current file exceeds a given size or time period.

    • Constructor Summary

      • RotatingFilePrintWriterSupplier

        public RotatingFilePrintWriterSupplier(java.nio.file.Path outputFile,
                                       FileRotationStrategy rotationStrategy,
                                       int maxArchives)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Create a PrintWriter supplier.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - The file to write the latest output to.
        rotationStrategy - The strategy for rotating this file away.
        maxArchives - The maximum number of rotated archives to keep.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file could not be opened for writing.

      • RotatingFilePrintWriterSupplier

                                       int maxArchives,
                                       FileRotationListener rotationListener)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Create a PrintWriter supplier.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - The file to write the latest output to.
        rotationStrategy - The strategy for rotating this file away.
        maxArchives - The maximum number of rotated archives to keep.
        rotationListener - A listener for callbacks related to rotation.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file could not be opened for writing.

      • RotatingFilePrintWriterSupplier

        public RotatingFilePrintWriterSupplier(java.nio.file.Path outputFile,
                                       FileRotationStrategy rotationStrategy,
                                       int maxArchives,
                                       java.util.concurrent.Executor rotationExecutor)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Create a PrintWriter supplier.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - The file to write the latest output to.
        rotationStrategy - The strategy for rotating this file away.
        maxArchives - The maximum number of rotated archives to keep.
        rotationExecutor - A Executor that will be used for running rotations.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file could not be opened for writing.
